background: Leads TG4’s factual slate, prioritising Irish-language documentaries that promote culture, heritage and identity. Seeks original, visually rich stories in Gaelic or Celtic contexts.
thematic_priorities: Historical series or biographies of Irish figures
International co-productions with Gaelic or Celtic themes
content_not_wanted: Content with limited cultural or heritage value
technical_requirements: Irish-language delivery; subtitles for broader reach
current_calls: Docs celebrating Irish heritage, folklore and Gaelic culture
submission_process: Irish-language proposal with synopsis, structure and talent details
name: Máire Ní Chonláin
